levels.description:
Deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to up to <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> enemies and causes targets affected by Talent 1 to <$ba.levitate>Levitate</>, then removes <$ba.levitate>Levitate</> from all enemies with <$ba.levitate>Levitate</>, activates Talent 1 on them with 100% chance, and deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale_down:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage
<@ba.rem>Max 2 charges</>

Deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to up to <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> enemies and causes targets affected by Talent 1 to <$ba.levitate>Levitate</>, then removes <$ba.levitate>Levitate</> from all enemies with <$ba.levitate>Levitate</>, activates Talent 1 on them with 100% chance, and deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale_down:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage
